suspect.name: John Harrison
suspect.alibi: He claims he was at home during the time of the incident.
suspect.confirmation: His alibi was confirmed by multiple witnesses.

witness.name: Sarah Thompson
witness.observation: I was walking in the woods when I saw a strange glowing object in the sky.
witness.description: Sarah is a local hiker and frequently explores the remote location where the phenomena occurred.

npcs.name: Officer Roberts
npcs.dialogue: I've never seen anything like this before, there's definitely something strange going on here.

npcs.name: Dr. Rebecca Woods
npcs.dialogue: I've been studying these phenomena for years, but I still haven't found a rational explanation.

clues.Front door: The front door of the cabin was found wide open.
clues.Living room: There are strange symbols scrawled on the walls.
clues.Kitchen: Radiation levels in the kitchen are abnormally high.
clues.Bedroom: A diary with cryptic entries mentioning the phenomena was found under the bed.
